metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39247 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Zint Barcode Generator before 2.10.0 has a one-byte buffer over-read, related to is_last_single_ascii in code1.c, and rs_encode_uint in reedsol.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzint2.12 - 2.11.0-1
zint - 2.11.0-1
zint-qt - 2.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zint package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.0-1').
